objects.text:
BARBIE WORLD
PET PARADISE
KITTY PLAYSET

9 PIECES INCLUDING 2 CATS,
FOOD ACCESSORIES, & TOYS

• Spinning Palm Tree
• Adjustable Leaf Bed
• Relaxing Hammock

product_details.description: Welcome to your Barbie World. Build your best Barbie life! Pounce into pet paradise with this kitty tower playset. Designed with a spinning palm tree, adjustable leaf bed, and relaxing hammock  there are so many pawesome ways for the two pet kitties to play. Also included is a bag of cat food, bowls, and toys. Doll sold separately. Colors and decorations may vary.

banner_details:
The banner features a vibrant split layout with a playful and kid-friendly theme. The left section is a bright pink background embellished with soft white circles, housing all the textual content. This includes the bold and attention-grabbing heading ("heading"), a compact subheading explaining the set contents ("subheading"), a bullet list highlighting product features ("description"), and a large prominent price tag ("price"). A rectangular call-to-action button in teal includes engaging text ("cta_text"). On the right, a toy product image ("product_image") is placed on a light cream background with whimsical curved line decorations and graphic shapes, enhancing visual interest.

**Color Palette**:
- Pink: #FF6EB1
- Light Pink: #FFF9F9
- White: #FFFFFF
- Teal: #5ACEBA
- Purple: #A065FF
- Accent Orange-Tan (toy base): #E7B785
product_color: The product image showcases a playful pastel-themed toy set dominated by soft and vibrant colors that blend harmoniously while emphasizing fun. Key colors include hot pink (#EF4EA7) for the upper playhouse, mint green (#6ED3A2) for the grass roof and large leaf, and light tan (#F4CBA0) for the supporting columns and base. Accents like sky blue (#5EC4DC) in the hammock and bowl, lavender (#BA9EDD) in the sign and bowl, and violet (#7F3FBF) in the small turtle and fish add variety. The blending of soft neutrals with pops of bright candy colors creates an engaging look suitable for a child-focused advertisement banner.
